snippet: Before he resigned Friday as the director of the Central Intelligence Agency, David H. Petraeus had seemed all but indestructible.
abstract: Resignation of David H Petraeus as director of Central Intelligence Agency due to extra-marital affair comes as shocking end to brilliant career; Petraeus and his wife Holly were widely viewed by military families as role model for making marriage work despite separation and hardship of long overseas deployments.

byline.original: By SCOTT SHANE and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Thom Shanker, Michael R. Gordon and David E. Sanger from Washington, and Viv Bernstein from Charlotte, N.C.

lead_paragraph: Before he resigned Friday as the director of the Central Intelligence Agency, David H. Petraeus had seemed all but indestructible.

headline.seo: David Petraeus, Seen as an Invincible C.I.A. Director, Self-Destructs
headline.main: A Brilliant Career With a Meteoric Rise and an Abrupt Fall
headline.print_headline: A Brilliant Career With a Meteoric Rise And an Abrupt Fall

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
